text:
The [[Ghaal'dar]] of [[Darguun]] are an alliance of [[goblinoid]] tribes. One such tribe, the Gantii Vus ("Hungry Flame"), are among the most loyal to Lhesh [[Haruuc Shaarat'kor]]. Their banner depicts a fanged maw wreathed in flames. The clan is led by [[Munta the Gray]].

The Gantii Vus fought alongside [[Brelish|Breland]] troops late in the [[Last War]], most notably during the [[Battle of Cairn Hill]].
title: Gantii Vus
